Class Items

  • java.lang.Object
    • gyurix.spigotlib.Items
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PostLoadable

    public class Items
extends java.lang.Object
implements PostLoadable
    Class representing the custom item names stored in the config, used in the ItemAPI
